trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Tallahassee
There were no other sightings in Tallahassee on or around December 15th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in Hot Tub looking at South sky. December 2003.. Sky clear, noclouds,many stars to see in spite of city light. Between I think Mars andanother bright starplanet to the right, a bright star-like light blinked onfor about 3 seconds. Then went off. 2-3 minutes later no clouds bright lightas bright as Jupiter, Mars. Venus went on again...and for the next 30minutes.... on and off, wife and I saw it again and again... same relativeposition., friend told me fixed satellite, but I looked next night, saw nothing. NOTHING. And then several nights since. This was not a plane as I know theairport to be South of town also and the approach to Tallahasse airport isSOuth and North of town. This was no airplane. This was not a satellite.Don
